document.full_text: libyan leader muammar gaddafi vowed on tuesday in a speech broadcast live on state television to fight to the end, after nato intensified air strikes on tripoli.
document.title: libya's gaddafi vows to fight to the death
lines_and_colors: libyan leader muammar gaddafi vowed on tuesday in a speech broadcast live on state television to fight to the end, after nato intensified air strikes on tripoli.
